messages.title: A fresh start for Newcastle
messages.content: Aaron talks about local issues in Newcastle-under-lyme.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stopping the closure of local services, including the community hospital.
Delivering fairer funding for all our schools.
Support for more police on the beat.
Opposing the unfair Brown Bin Tax.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Reference to 'last time' suggests a tactical voting consideration.

issues.education: Fairer funding for schools is a key point mentioned.
issues.health: Stopping the closure of local services, including the community hospital.

leaflet.personalStatement: Aaron states he has a track record of getting things done and will be a strong voice for Newcastle.

endorsements.endorsement: Boris Johnson backs Aaron Bell, mentioning Aaron's support for getting Brexit done and that he will be a fantastic advocate for the people of Newcastle-under-Lyme.

quotes.text: We need a fresh start for our area with a local champion who can deliver for our community.

images.caption: Aaron Bell with supporters, leaflets and interacting with the public.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet also contains 'My plan for Newcastle' which outlines specific local issues and includes personal and direct communication from Aaron Bell.
